MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G46 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Barrland Drive and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified a potential fault on the underground cable network near Barrland substation and are awaiting additional resources to attend and we now expect your supply to be restored by 9:15am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3am on 19th December
